channel.title: RSPS 575 / How to host it so other users can play? (Hamachi)
channel.description: So I looked through countless Youtube videos, and they all show me how to get and make my own RsPs but I want to know how I can put a web-client or just a download client on my website and have the source running on my pc and let other users be able to join my game either the web-client or the client they download. First off I do not know how to make a web-client I really want to know but I don't. I am using [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662648.0.html]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662648.0.html[/url] this source and client, but I do not know how to be able to let other users play it etc I don't even know what client to give them? do I give them my client folder or what?? that doesn't seem right but I am a noob back in maybe 2006 or 2007 I use to have a 317 RsPs or older can't remember and was able to let other users play it but its 2014 now and all memory of that time is lost :( I want to be able to host it from hamachi since I already am using it for other things etc. If anyone can help me that would be great you will get Co-Owner within my RsPs for sure and I would love to talk about what we should fix or add next etc but as of right now I need to know how to even put it online for other users and what how do I give users a client to use for my RsPs without letting them change the background etc and how to also make a web-client since I really would like to just post a .java code into a page of mine and have it be on my website.

item.title: RSPS 575 / How to host it so other users can play? (Hamachi)
item.dc:creator: @Kyle-Billni Kyle-Billni
item.description:
@Kyle-Billni wrote:

So I looked through countless Youtube videos, and they all show me how to get and make my own RsPs but I want to know how I can put a web-client or just a download client on my website and have the source running on my pc and let other users be able to join my game either the web-client or the client they download. First off I do not know how to make a web-client I really want to know but I don’t. I am using https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662648.0.html this source and client, but I do not know how to be able to let other users play it etc I don’t even know what client to give them? do I give them my client folder or what?? that doesn’t seem right but I am a noob back in maybe 2006 or 2007 I use to have a 317 RsPs or older can’t remember and was able to let other users play it but its 2014 now and all memory of that time is lost I want to be able to host it from hamachi since I already am using it for other things etc. If anyone can help me that would be great you will get Co-Owner within my RsPs for sure and I would love to talk about what we should fix or add next etc but as of right now I need to know how to even put it online for other users and what how do I give users a client to use for my RsPs without letting them change the background etc and how to also make a web-client since I really would like to just post a .java code into a page of mine and have it be on my website.

Read full topic
